item.description: A reflection on the bonds that form the foundation of a lifeâ€”family, love, and the quiet strength found in togetherness. The Circle of Three In morning light he stands so still, A quiet strength, an iron will. Yet when their laughter fills the air, His heart forgets all weight and care. Rekha, the song that warms his days, Her smile, a sun through life’s long haze. Roy, his echo, bold and free, A mirror of what love can be.
